guessWho.question: I was a British Prime Minister during World War II and am known for my speeches. Who am I?
I painted the Mona Lisa and designed flying machines. Who am I?
I was the first person to walk on the moon. Who am I?
I wrote 'Romeo and Juliet' and 'Hamlet'. Who am I?
I developed the theory of relativity and won the Nobel Prize in Physics. Who am I?
I was a civil rights leader known for my 'I Have a Dream' speech. Who am I?
I composed 'The Magic Flute' and died at age 35. Who am I?
I was the first woman to win a Nobel Prize. Who am I?
I founded Microsoft with Paul Allen. Who am I?
I was known as the 'Iron Lady' and was Britain's first female Prime Minister. Who am I?
I invented the telephone. Who am I?
I was a famous nurse during the Crimean War and am called 'The Lady with the Lamp'. Who am I?
I sailed across the Atlantic in 1492 and 'discovered' America. Who am I?
I was a famous detective created by Arthur Conan Doyle. Who am I?
I was the last Pharaoh of Ancient Egypt and had relationships with Julius Caesar and Mark Antony. Who am I?
I painted 'The Starry Night' and cut off my ear. Who am I?
I was the 16th President of the United States and freed the slaves. Who am I?
I wrote '1984' and 'Animal Farm'. Who am I?
I was a French military leader and emperor who was exiled to Elba. Who am I?
I discovered penicillin by accident. Who am I?
I was a famous spy during World War I known as 'the woman who never was'. Who am I?
I co-founded Apple Computer with Steve Wozniak. Who am I?
I was a famous gangster during Prohibition known as 'Scarface'. Who am I?
I wrote 'Pride and Prejudice' and 'Sense and Sensibility'. Who am I?
I was a famous magician and escape artist. Who am I?
I led India to independence through non-violent protest. Who am I?
I was a famous pilot who disappeared over the Pacific Ocean. Who am I?
I painted the ceiling of the Sistine Chapel. Who am I?
I was known as the 'Maid of Orléans' and was burned at the stake. Who am I?
I founded the social media platform Facebook. Who am I?
I was a famous outlaw in the American Old West with the surname James. Who am I?
I was the first person to run a mile in under 4 minutes. Who am I?
I was a famous blues guitarist known as 'King of the Blues'. Who am I?
I was the first woman in space. Who am I?
I wrote 'The Origin of Species'. Who am I?
I was a famous tennis player known as 'The Ice Maiden'. Who am I?
I founded the Virgin Group and own an island. Who am I?
I was known as 'The Great Bambino' in baseball. Who am I?
I was a famous fashion designer known for the little black dress. Who am I?
I was the youngest person to win a Nobel Peace Prize. Who am I?
